website_summaries.verdict: The Canon imageFormula P-208 Scan-tini Personal Document Scanner combines a capable scanner with somewhat limited software.
pros: Scan utility in firmware allows scanning without software installation
cons: No software included for converting scans to editable text

customer_reviews.title: I love it.
customer_reviews.text: I love this scanner, it is so easy to use. Even if the picture goes in crooked it comes out straight. You can use it anywhere and it handles little pictures as well as 8x10's as easily. Just love it beats my desktop scanner in ease and speed. I can copy tons of pictures right after each other not much waiting then I download them to picasa and clean them up and crop if necessary. Delivery was right on time.
customer_reviews.author: Krystahl

customer_reviews.title: Kinda works, Kinda doesn't
customer_reviews.text: As of Feb 1st, 2014, the twain drivers, either bundled on the cdrom and grabbed from Canon's support site, do not work for Macs running OSX 10.9. I had no problem getting the P-208 to be recognized as a twain device on Mac running an older revision of OSX. The lack of twain drivers isn't a problem if you don't mind being stuck using Canon's no-frills software to scan documents. I also experienced problems with documents getting scanned in crooked more often than not. The tiny plastic arms used to hold the documents aren't helping matters. On the upside, scanning and processing documents at 300dpi seemed relatively fast.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Chan

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my medical office to easily scan ID's and Insurance cards to my patient charts and it has overall been great. The only problem I had was it had reset or something and my computer wasn't recognizing it was already installed. The problem was fixed and no issues since.
customer_reviews.author: C Wood

customer_reviews.title: Strongly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Works great, scans both sides of the page at the same time. Feeder works superb on flat sheets and fairly descent with wrinkled pages. Portable and hassle-free software works like a charm. No problemas so far
customer_reviews.author: Hector G.

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm! Bought it for my dad in order to finally get rid of all his old paperwork and file cabinets, but I steal it from time to time to do my own papers.
customer_reviews.author: A. Aguirre

customer_reviews.title: I use it to scan receipts for expense reports - it scans both sides at the same time and the detail is great.
customer_reviews.text: This works perfectly! I use it to scan receipts for expense reports - it scans both sides at the same time and the detail is great.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Quality, well respected name brand, very portable, consistent quality, ease of use
customer_reviews.text: Quality, well respected name brand, very portable, consistent quality, ease of use
customer_reviews.author: Audiophile

customer_reviews.title: The scanner works great. The software I am less happy with
customer_reviews.text: The scanner works great. The software I am less happy with. I it is very basic software, but gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph A. Murray

customer_reviews.title: Love the built in program
customer_reviews.text: I take it everywhere I go. Love the built in program; no installation needed!
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn

customer_reviews.title: Great little scanner on the go
customer_reviews.text: I'm pleasantly surprised how well and fast this portable scanner is, specially its capacity of scanning both side of a page in one pass. Saving settings a bit confusing but manageable once you get the hang of it. Highly recommended in its price range.
customer_reviews.author: iberoguy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for mobile needs
customer_reviews.text: Perfect you cannot go wrong simple does the Job. Once I read the instruction work well should never lose papers again.
customer_reviews.author: Dante

customer_reviews.title: GREAT DEAL
customer_reviews.text: GREAT SMALL PRODUCT AND A GREAT PRICE DOES WHAT ITS SUPPOSED TO
customer_reviews.author: pambland

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to set-up and use.
customer_reviews.text: I will be using it mostly as a portable unit with my laptop to scan old pictures. I just set it up last night. It was very easy to set up and operate and it is basically plug-and-play. I scanned a few test pictures and the images came out perfect. So far, it fits all my need. I will give more reports later as soon as I am able to.
customer_reviews.author: Mon TYM

customer_reviews.title: first i get a package in poor condition. Bad
customer_reviews.text: sorry, first i get a package in poor condition. Bad.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen S. Santiago

customer_reviews.title: Canon Scan-tini scanner
customer_reviews.text: Working on going paperless at home. Easy to use, pretty fast, even does a decent job on photos.
customer_reviews.author: noname

customer_reviews.title: Not for Windows 8.1
customer_reviews.text: Hm......a great product, as long as you "Do not have Windows 8.1, It just wont sync or run, a waste of money, perhaps with Win 7 OK. I am very dissatisfied. I have a fast lap top, a quad core, with 16GB ram, and also Bought Omnipage 18, and it will not even recognize the P208.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Stein

customer_reviews.title: Used at Work Bought for Home
customer_reviews.text: Had these at work and liked them enough to buy for home. Easy to use and does a satisfactory job.
customer_reviews.author: JB 28540

customer_reviews.title: Amazing little scanner
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing little scanner. It works flawlessly, exactly as described. Duplex feature is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Philip101

customer_reviews.title: Quality and size good but feeder poor
customer_reviews.text: Most scans wen through slightly skewed. I replaced it with the P-215 which feeds documents much better. I do not recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: Richard H. Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Positive: It works fairly well, scanning both sides. Attention: Pages must be thick enough to let the scanner operate correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Francisco Javier Dominguez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works perfect , no problems , very happy with delivery time and the way it operates, thank you
customer_reviews.author: Giuliano Zaratin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Just a great bit of kit that worked straight out of the box and has presented no problems after 8 weeks of use.
customer_reviews.author: Mr David Owen

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a gift
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend is constantly complaining about needing a scanner (he's a team leader in the Army and has to keep track of his soldier's papers), and I got him this for Christmas. He says it works great and has really saved him a few times since it's so portable. He plans on taking it with him on his next deployment, so I also got an extended coverage package (separate).
customer_reviews.author: Tabatha Maddox

customer_reviews.title: A little beauty
customer_reviews.text: I tried it both ways. Plug and scan and with downloading the software on an MacBook Pro and on a iMac and both worked great. I love the duplex scanning. I have a big old scanner at work that doesn't function very well, now that I know I don't need any special software, I'll be bringing this in. I tried all kinds of odd sized paper and this scanner could handle them. The thinner paper I scanned didn't go as well as thicker paper. Just for fun, I scanned a photograph. The color was more vibrant than the original so ok, but not great. I'm loving this scanner for the portability and ease of use.
customer_reviews.author: K. Roman

customer_reviews.title: Runs seamlessley
customer_reviews.text: This is so easy to set up and run. Literally less than 5 minutes for me and I was scanning things. I can scan photos or regular paper, makes no difference. I don't travel with it, just leave it hooked up and resting on my desk. It takes up so little room, compared to a regular scanner.
customer_reviews.author: D. S.

customer_reviews.title: Terrific little scanner!
customer_reviews.text: This small, lightweight scanner produces clear, detailed copies in no time. It's user friendly. I love the ability to take it anywhere with my Ipad.
customer_reviews.author: Music Maker

customer_reviews.title: Great scanner!
customer_reviews.text: I use this scanner as a notary to scan back documents to title companies. I don't take the scanner with me, but keep it at home and attach it to the computer as needed. The speed is decent, the quality is good, and the scanner seems sturdy enough to be able to withstand constant use.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good For the Money
customer_reviews.text: There is no need to rehash the feature set already clearly articulated by both Canon and other reviewers. I personally prefer a flatbed scanner for daily use. However, if space and portability is an issue, then the Canon P-208 is worth your consideration for home use. If you are a pro, spend the extra $50 for the P-215. I have used Canon printers and scanners for many years and have confidence in their balance of feature quality and durability.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Can't believe how great this is!
customer_reviews.text: I never dreamed that a portable scanner would work this well. Wish I had starting using it sooner! It was so easy to install and is perfect for my home office. I have scanned 3 - 6 page documents with no issues. It has a neat future for longer documents where you can scan a few pages at a time and add them to the same document.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

product_meta.title: Canon imageFORMULA P-208 Scan-tini Personal Document Scanner (Discontinued by Manufacturer)
product_meta.description:
imageFORMULA P-208: the ultra-compact, productive scanner for mobile or home users. The compact and stylish P-208 mobile scanner is the perfect choice for traveling executives and home users. A 10-sheet ADF and high speed duplex scanning ensure productivity is always maintained.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER


The Canon imageFORMULA P-208 Scan-tini personal document scanner’s ultra-compact size and robust features help make it ideal for mobile use at home, the office, and anywhere in between. It can be moved from location to location as easily as it moves paper-based information to Windows and Mac devices, and beyond.

view larger Canon imageFORMULA P-208 Scan-tini Personal Document Scanner Scan-tini with optional WU10 (sold separately). view larger Unclutter your life as you go, with the small-size, light weight, Canon imageFORMULA P-208 Scan-tini Personal Document Scanner. view larger A WIDE VARIETY OF APPLICATIONS
The Canon imageFORMULA P-208 Scan-tini Personal Document Scanner is ideal for stationary users and “road warriors.” It provides general purpose scanning of various items, including receipts, business cards, photographs, bills, contracts, reports, letters, plastic ID cards or driver licenses, and more. Whether used at home or in the office, the device can help improve personal efficiency, organization, and productivity. Users can benefit from its ultra-compact size and flexibility, scanning items with ease and helping reduce paper in the process.

OTHER SOFTWARE INCLUDED WITH P-208:
 * Presto! BizCard, to convert business cards into useful data that can be searched, sorted, imported into other contact management systems
 * Evernote (Windows/Mac) for cloud-based filing and collaboration
 * CaptureOnTouch Mobile (downloadable for Android/iPad/iPhone)
 * ISIS/TWAIN (Windows)
 *  TWAIN (Mac)

BUNDLED SOFTWARE
Canon's CaptureOnTouch software tool (Windows/Mac) can help increase user productivity by simplifying the document scanning process. The intuitive interface enables users to quickly and efficiently scan documents and automatically distribute them.

CaptureOnTouch software can be configured for one touch scanning. CaptureOnTouch Lite software (built in, and Windows/Mac compatible) allows users to scan documents without loading device drivers or other software. view larger 



COMPACT AND CONVENIENT
 *  1.54” (H) x 12.3” (W) x 2.19”(D)—fits easily into a briefcase or bag
 * 1.3 lb.—Portable and mobile
 * Powered via a single USB cable connection—helps reduce cable clutter

EASY TO USE
 *  “Plug-and-Scan” capability—immediate scanning without installing drivers or imaging applications
 *  CaptureOnTouch software to configure one touch scanning
 *  Windows ISIS / TWAIN drivers, Mac TWAIN driver

ENVIRONMENT IN MIND
 *  Meets ENERGY STAR guidelines
 *  EU RoHS Compliant
 *  EU WEEE Compliant 

MAXIMUM IMAGE QUALITY
 *  Character Emphasis to help improve legibility
 *  Auto Resolution setting
 *  Photograph scanning optimization
 *  Optical Character Recognition (OCR) to convert paper-based documents into digital information that can easily be searched, stored, and shared.

PRODUCTIVE AND FLEXIBLE
 *  Scan both sides of a document at the same time
 *  Scans in color or black-and-white
 *  Can handle thick or thin documents, plastic or embossed cards
 *  When combined with optional WU10 Wireless Adapter and Battery Pack, the scanner not only works wirelessly in Windows and Mac environments, but also with iPad, iPhone, iPod touch, and Android devices using the free downloadable Canon CaptureOnTouch Mobile app.



For investment protection, eCarePAK options are available on the P-208 scanner. eCarePAK extends service beyond the initial one-year advanced exchange warranty period, saving on costs associated with post-purchase maintenance and maximizing uptime throughout the product life.

view larger 

 WHAT'S IN THE BOX? 
Main Canon imageFORMULA P-208 Scan-tini Personal Document Scanner Unit, safekeeping bag, USB cable, setup DVD, setup guide, supplement for AutoStart Switch, warranty card.

feature_bullets: “Plug-and-Scan” capability for immediate scanning without installing drivers or imaging applications
Scan both sides of a document at the same time, in color or black-and-white
Scans various items, including receipts, business cards, photos, bills, letters, plastic ID cards or driver licenses, and more
Optical Character Recognition (OCR) to help convert paper-based documents into digital information that can easily be searched, stored, and shared
Works in both Windows and Mac environments
